img_text: Hibernian have made an offer of £36,500 for Kenny McKenzie.Interest in McKenzie is thought to be high, with Dundee Utd, Kilarnock and Raith among the clubs rumoured to be looking at the player. It is believed that McKenzie's preferred choice of move could well be Kilmarnock. Chairman Norrie Innes feels this offer was too good to refuse and has decided to take matters into his own hands by accepting this transfer bid on behalf of the management. o Kenny McKenzie 18 year-old striker O Accepted FEE £36.5 ADDITIONAL FEES
